query:
-- 查询WHY用户的基本信息
SELECT id, username, name, role, status FROM users WHERE username = 'WHY';

-- 查询WHY用户的股票权限
SELECT 
  ssp.id,
  ssp.staffUserId,
  ssp.stockUserId,
  su.name as stockUserName
FROM staffStockPermissions ssp
JOIN stockUsers su ON ssp.stockUserId = su.id
WHERE ssp.staffUserId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'WHY');
